data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in South Tripura, Tripura, India to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of South Tripura, Tripura, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 9,636 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of South Tripura words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in South Tripura with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Marma people.
Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in South Tripura, Tripura, India, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in South Tripura who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.section_summary:
the county of South Tripura, Tripura, India has a population of 876,000.

We estimate South Tripura has 9,636 people who might know Jesus, 10,629 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 855,735 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the county of South Tripura an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.
